thumb.title: Tasogare - Mai Yamane ( Chis-A cover )
thumb.description: | LO-FI | CITY-POP | INDIE-POP | DREAM-POP | VAPOR-WAVE | 山根麻衣 - たそがれ (1980) lyrics:森下優 song:中村裕介 vo : Chis-A (知声） bandcamp : https://m-tomi-rom.bandcamp.com/ x : / ew5lmcowakzr2mk instagram : / m.tomi.room youtube : / @m.tomi.room102 soundcloud : https://soundcloud.com/m-o-e-989544138 If this sound left something in your heart, your support through membership will become the seed of my next creation. Gateway to stillness→https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBtRg-2v6ZKcblX58gVmenw/join しずかなばしょのいりぐち →https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBtRg-2v6ZKcblX58gVmenw/join #indiepop #dreampop #citypop #MaiYamane #Tasogare #vintagesounds #AnalogFeel #cowboybebop #japanesecitypop #vinylculture #RetroVibes #TwilightAesthetic #MinimalSetupMusic #SoundAsMemory #vaporwave
thumb.last_res_body: めっちゃしっとり うぽつです
